description: What are ya all afraid?! Moblins are never afraid! Get off your butts and join the big bad mob of Moblins nooowww!
tooltip: What are ya all afraid?! Moblins are never afraid! Get off your butts and join the big bad mob of Moblins nooowww! (Moblin Mob battalion size increases by 25%. Up to 25% of a Moblin Mob battalion can be restored for free)
